sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {_id,title,photo,city, price, featured, reviews }= tour const {totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return
{featured &&Featured}
{city} {avgRating===0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating===0 ? 'Not rated' :(({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per person
} export default TourCard
